title: The AI Conference 2025
summary: The AI Conference brings together the brightest minds in AI for 2 days of sessions on AGI, Foundation Models, Neural Architectures, AI Infrastructure, and real-world applications. Features 100+ speakers across 4 tracks with industry leaders from Google DeepMind, Meta, AMD, Berkeley, and more.
descriptionMd:
## The AI Conference 2025: Shaping the Future of AI

**September 17-18, 2025 | Pier 48, Mission Rock, San Francisco**

The AI Conference is a groundbreaking vendor-neutral event brought to you by the creators of **MLconf** and **Ben Lorica**, former Program Chair of The O'Reilly Artificial Intelligence Conference.

### Event Overview

**2 DAYS | 4 TRACKS | 100+ SPEAKERS**

Join the most comprehensive AI event of 2025, featuring world-renowned AI specialists, revolutionary ideas, transformative use cases, and groundbreaking research. Whether you're a researcher, engineer, entrepreneur, or executive, you'll find opportunities to learn, collaborate, and network with some of the brightest minds in AI.

### Featured Speakers

The conference brings together an exceptional lineup of AI leaders:

- **Dr. Rodney Brooks** - Co-Founder & CTO, Robust.AI
- **Lin Qiao** - CEO and Co-Founder, Fireworks AI
- **Ion Stoica** - Professor Berkeley | EECS
- **Tris Warkentin** - Director of Product Management, Google DeepMind
- **Dr. Sharon Zhou** - Corporate VP of AI, AMD
- **Jure Leskovec** - Chief Scientist, Kumo AI
- **Jai Malkani** - Global Head of AI & Product, Uber
- **Marc Tessier-Lavigne** - Co-founder, Chairman & CEO, Xaira
- And 90+ more industry pioneers

### Conference Tracks

#### 1. AI Research & Development
Dive into the future of AI with cutting-edge research presentations on:
- AGI fundamentals and breakthroughs
- Multimodal models and visual reasoning
- Foundational models and fine-tuning strategies
- Neural architectures and model compression
- Open-source AI development

#### 2. AI Engineering & Infrastructure
Practical sessions for builders and engineers:
- Building high-performance AI data pipelines
- Vector databases and embeddings
- Scalable inference and optimization
- MLOps best practices
- AI agents and autonomous systems

#### 3. AI Strategy & Leadership
Insights for executives and decision-makers:
- Enterprise AI adoption strategies
- AI governance and compliance
- Investment trends and market outlook
- Building AI-first organizations
- The future of AI's impact on business and society

#### 4. Applied AI
Real-world AI applications across industries:
- **Healthcare & Biotech**: Drug discovery, patient care, diagnostics
- **Retail**: Supply chain optimization, personalization, demand forecasting
- **Finance**: Risk assessment, fraud detection, algorithmic trading
- **Wearables & Edge AI**: Ambient devices, real-time processing
- **Responsible AI**: Ethics, transparency, and fairness

### Featured Panels

**AI at the Edge: Wearables, Glasses & Ambient Devices**
Explore how AI is moving beyond smartphones to wearables and ambient computing with leaders from Meta and Google.

**AI in Healthcare and Biotech**
Experts from Xaira, Pfizer, and Menlo Ventures discuss AI's transformation of drug discovery and patient care.

**AI in Retail**
Leaders from Amazon, Walmart, and Wayfair share real-world implementations of AI at scale.

### Topics Covered

- **AGI**: Systems with human-like cognitive abilities
- **Foundation Models & LLMs**: GPT-class models, efficiency, responsible deployment
- **Generative AI**: Transformers, diffusion models, multimodal generation
- **Neural Architectures**: Transformer models, self-attention, model compression
- **AI Infrastructure**: Development tools, deployment platforms, scalability
- **Ethics & Alignment**: Human values, safety, responsible AI development
- **AI Startups**: Building, funding, and scaling AI businesses
- **Emerging Topics**: Vector databases, synthetic data, AI governance

### Schedule

**Wednesday, September 17th**
- 07:30 AM - Registration & Coffee
- 09:00 AM - Keynotes
- 11:30 AM - Track Sessions
- 12:30 PM - Lunch & Lunch Talks
- 02:00 PM - Afternoon Sessions
- 05:00 PM - Closing Reception & Networking

**Thursday, September 18th**
- 08:00 AM - Registration & Coffee
- 09:00 AM - Keynotes
- 11:30 AM - Track Sessions
- 12:30 PM - Lunch & Lunch Talks
- 02:00 PM - Afternoon Sessions
- 05:00 PM - Ice Cream Social

### Why Attend?

- **Stay Ahead**: Learn about the latest AI advancements and emerging technologies
- **Network**: Connect with AI pioneers, researchers, founders, and investors
- **Learn**: Gain practical insights from real-world case studies and implementations
- **Collaborate**: Find partners, talent, and opportunities in the AI ecosystem
- **Get Inspired**: Draw inspiration from revolutionary ideas and groundbreaking research

### Venue & Location

**Pier 48 | Mission Rock**
San Francisco, CA 94158

Located in the heart of San Francisco's waterfront district, the venue offers stunning views and state-of-the-art facilities for this premier AI gathering.

### Sponsors

The conference is made possible by support from leading AI companies including AWS, IBM, AI Alliance, Neo4j, and many innovative AI startups and organizations.

### Registration

All ticket types provide full access to:
- All sessions and tracks
- Networking events
- The Sponsor Pavilion
- Lunch and refreshments
- Conference materials

**Note**: Early bird pricing available for a limited time. The conference sells out every year, so secure your spot early!

### Contact

For more information, visit [aiconference.com](https://aiconference.com/)

---

*Join us for the most comprehensive AI conference of 2025, where the future of artificial intelligence is being shaped by today's brightest minds.*

title: Tech Week 2025
summary: Join us for Tech Week 2025 - one of the largest tech conferences featuring top companies and leaders shaping the future of tech. Host your event alongside industry giants in San Francisco, Los Angeles, or New York City.
descriptionMd:
## Tech Week 2025

Tech Week 2025 is one of the largest tech conferences, bringing together the brightest minds, innovative startups, and established tech giants for a week of learning, networking, and collaboration.

### Event Overview

Tech Week is a decentralized conference model where companies and organizations host their own events throughout the week, creating a vibrant ecosystem of tech activities across multiple cities.

### Locations

**Primary Cities:**
- **San Francisco** - The heart of Silicon Valley
- **Los Angeles** - Growing tech hub on the West Coast
- **New York City** - East Coast tech and finance center

### How It Works

1. **Host Your Own Event**: Companies and organizations can submit proposals to host events during Tech Week
2. **Featured on Master Calendar**: Approved events are featured on the official Tech Week calendar
3. **Join the Ecosystem**: Connect with other hosts and attendees across hundreds of events

### Event Types

Tech Week features a diverse range of event formats:
- Breakfast, Brunch & Lunch gatherings
- Dinner events
- Experiential activities
- Hackathons
- Happy hours
- Matchmaking & speed networking
- Panel discussions & fireside chats
- Pitch events & demo days
- Workshops & roundtables

### Themes & Topics

Events cover cutting-edge topics including:
- Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
- Startups & Entrepreneurship
- Venture Capital & Funding
- Web3 & Blockchain
- Developer Tools & Infrastructure
- Product Development
- Marketing & Growth
- Future of Work

### Important Dates

- **Submission Deadline (SF/LA)**: Friday, August 22, 2025 at 5:00 PM PT
- **Event Week**: October 6-10, 2025 (dates may vary by city)

### Sponsorship

Tech Week is supported by:
- **Platinum Sponsors**: Industry-leading companies
- **Gold Sponsors**: Major tech organizations

### Hosting Requirements

- Events should be in accessible neighborhoods:
  - **SF**: SOMA/Mission area preferred
  - **LA**: Westside (Santa Monica area) preferred
  - **NYC**: SoHo area preferred
- Must include Tech Week logo on event pages
- Provide Partiful registration link
- Agree to Tech Week community guidelines

### Get Involved

**Host an Event**: Submit your proposal at [tech-week.com/host](https://www.tech-week.com/host)

**Attend Events**: Browse the full calendar of events across all cities (coming soon)

**Questions?**: Contact hello@tech-week.com

### Community Guidelines

All events and participants must adhere to Tech Week's community guidelines and privacy policy. By participating, you agree that events are independently organized and Tech Week organizers (including a16z and affiliated entities) are not liable for individual events.

---

*Join thousands of tech professionals, founders, investors, and innovators for an unforgettable week of connection and innovation at Tech Week 2025!*
